reviewText: I have done bookbinding for about 20 years and repaied many family bibles during this time. I learned many diffrent techniques that will make future repairs easier and better..

I found this DVD absolutely fascinating. Janette Heffernan did an excellent job in showing how this master book restorer combines art and craftsmanship to do a beautiful job.  It has given me new respect for the work involved in restoring these wonderful old books.
